api_url.title: API URL
api_url.description: The API URL for fetching data from Harness NextGen

organization_ids.title: Organization IDs
organization_ids.description: Optional list of organization identifiers to filter. If empty, all organizations will be synced.

project_ids.title: Project IDs
project_ids.description: Optional list of project identifiers to filter. If empty, all projects will be synced.

cutoff_days.title: Cutoff Days
cutoff_days.description: Only fetch executions updated after cutoff

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Number of records to fetch per API call (max 100)

deployment_timeout.title: Deployment Timeout
deployment_timeout.description: Max number of hours to consider for a deployment to be running/queued before giving up on syncing it
